Okay, this looks fun actually.  For starters, I'm forty one years old, and =
I'm familiar with TFG1, Armada, Energon, Cybertron, Beast Wars, Beast machi=
nes and TF animated.

I've been role playing for about five to six years an=
d I would have to say that one of my favorite characters from Armada is DEM=
OLISHER. He was considered the comic relief of the series.  In TF animated,=
 I would have to say that my favorite was basically all of them, with the e=
xception of Starscream being my ultimate favorite.  No matter what series, =
Starscream was the best. Especially in the Energon series, where he actuall=
y had a change of heart.  

What I like about role playing is that we can t=
ake on whatever character we want, within reason. I chose my characters bas=
ed on my many aspects of my personality, and found it fun to break it up in=
to various characters.  Tucson represents my short temper while Nightshift =
portrays my reasonable side.  Then there's the casually comical side portra=
yed by Quickstride and Uproar.  Sarcasm gets portrayed by Rattrap and Strai=
ght Shot.  Put them all together and you have me.  



Don't be envious of =
what you don't have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing is=
 worth more than family and friends.

On Nov 13, 2011, at 9:16 AM, Super Cy=
clonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> Here are a few questions that i =
asked Airly, and I think I will throw
> out in a public way. You don't have=
 to answer them all if you don't
> want to, some of us are private people, =
but they can give us a little
> background into who we are as players and w=
hat we like.
> 
> How old are you (You don't have to answer this one if you=
 don't want to. Heh!)
> 
> Which types of transformer are you most familiar=
? (80's Cartoon, 80's
> Comic book, TF: Antimated, TF: Prime, TF: Energon, =
Dreamwave Comics,
> ect.)
> 
> What are your favorite characters from the c=
artoons?
> 
> How long have you been roleplaying, and where?
> 
> What do y=
ou like about Role playing, what are you looking for?
> 
> Again, you don't=
 have to answer all the questions, but it gives
> something to think about,=
 and helps us to get to know you. I will be
> posting my own answers as wel=
l in the next day or so :)
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-546AADC8-BC01-4933-9314-2C291FFC3F74

ally.  For starters, I'm forty one years old, and I'm familiar with TF=
G1, Armada, Energon, Cybertron, Beast Wars, Beast machines and TF animated.=
</div><div><br></div><div>I've been role playing for about five to six year=
s and I would have to say that one of my favorite characters from Armada is=
 DEMOLISHER. He was considered the comic relief of the series.  In TF =
animated, I would have to say that my favorite was basically all of them, w=
ith the exception of Starscream being my ultimate favorite.  No matter=
 what series, Starscream was the best. Especially in the Energon series, wh=
ere he actually had a change of heart.  </div><div><br></div><div>What=
 I like about role playing is that we can take on whatever character we wan=
t, within reason. I chose my characters based on my many aspects of my pers=
onality, and found it fun to break it up into various characters.  Tuc=
son represents my short temper while Nightshift portrays my reasonable side=
.  Then there's the casually comical side portrayed by Quickstride and=
 Uproar.  Sarcasm gets portrayed by Rattrap and Straight Shot.  P=
ut them all together and you have me.  </div><div><br></div><div><br><=
br>Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for things you alre=
ady posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.</div><div>=
<br>On Nov 13, 2011, at 9:16 AM, Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto:super=
cyclonus@...">supercyclonus@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><di=
v></div><blockquote type=3D"cite"><div>














<span style=3D"displa=
y:none"> </span>



    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>=
Here are a few questions that i asked Airly, and I think I will throw<br>
o=
ut in a public way. You don't have to answer them all if you don't<br>
want=
 to, some of us are private people, but they can give us a little<br>
backg=
round into who we are as players and what we like.<br>
<br>
How old are you=
 (You don't have to answer this one if you don't want to. Heh!)<br>
<br>
Wh=
ich types of transformer are you most familiar? (80's Cartoon, 80's<br>
Com=
ic book, TF: Antimated, TF: Prime, TF: Energon, Dreamwave Comics,<br>
ect.)=
<br>
<br>
What are your favorite characters from the cartoons?<br>
<br>
How=
 long have you been roleplaying, and where?<br>
<br>
What do you like about=
 Role playing, what are you looking for?<br>
<br>
Again, you don't have to =
answer all the questions, but it gives<br>
something to think about, and he=
lps us to get to know you. I will be<br>
posting my own answers as well in =
the next day or so :)<br>
<br>
- Preston<br>
</p>
